text: "Don't Call Me Angel (Charlie's Angels)" is a song recorded by American singers Ariana Grande, Miley Cyrus, and Lana Del Rey. It was released on September 13, 2019, as the theme song to the upcoming remake of the film Charlie's Angels. It is an pop and R&B; song. All three artists wrote the song with Savan Kotecha, Alma-Sofia Miettinen, and its producers, Max Martin and Ilya. == References == Category:2019 songs Category:Ariana Grande songs Category:Miley Cyrus songs Category:Lana Del Rey songs Category:Pop songs Category:R&B; songs
title: Don't Call Me Angel
